name: GENTEX Corporation
description: Gentex Corporation is a leading technology company based in Zeeland, Michigan, specializing in the design and manufacture of automatic-dimming rearview mirrors, as well as advanced electronic products for the automotive industry. Founded in 1974, Gentex has established itself as a pioneer in the development of smart mirror technology, which enhances driving safety by reducing glare from headlights of vehicles behind. The company’s product line has expanded to include integrated camera systems, HomeLink® wireless control systems, and state-of-the-art optical sensors. Gentex is committed to innovation; its research and development initiatives focus on enhancing vehicle safety, comfort, and connectivity. With a strong emphasis on quality and customer satisfaction, Gentex collaborates closely with major automotive manufacturers worldwide. The company also actively promotes sustainability through environmentally conscious manufacturing processes and products that support energy efficiency. Gentex's mission is to provide innovative solutions that enhance the driving experience while promoting safety and sustainability on the road.
